Module com.example.brickdestroy
Package com.arcadegame.brickdestroy

Class Brick

java.lang.Object
com.arcadegame.brickdestroy.Brick
public class Brick
extends java.lang.Object
A class to store all the functions of bricks in the game

    • makeSingleTypeLevel

      public Brick[] makeSingleTypeLevel​(int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, java.lang.String type, int brickStrength)
      A method to create single type brick in a level
      Parameters:
      brickCnt - Total brick count in the game
      lineCnt - Total line count of bricks in the game
      brickSizeRatio - The brick size ratio of the brick
      type - The type of brick
      brickStrength - The strength of brick
      Returns:
      Returns an array of single type brick

    • makeChessboardLevel

      public Brick[] makeChessboardLevel​(int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, java.lang.String typeA, java.lang.String typeB, int typeAStrength, int typeBStrength)
      A method to create multi type brick in a level
      Parameters:
      brickCnt - Total brick count in the game
      lineCnt - Total line count of bricks in the game
      brickSizeRatio - The brick size ratio of the brick
      typeA - The first type of brick
      typeB - The second type of brick
      typeAStrength - The strength of first type of brick
      typeBStrength - The strength of second type of brick
      Returns:
      Returns an array of multi type bricks

    • makeBrick

      private javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle makeBrick​(double x, double y, double height, double width, java.lang.String type)
      A method to create a rectangle brick in game scene
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the brick
      y - y coordinate of the brick
      height - The height of the brick
      width - The width of the brick
      type - The type of the brick
      Returns:
      Returns a rectangle brick with specific x, y, height, width and style

      A method to draw crack on the collided bricks
      Parameters:
      scene - The scene where the crack will be drawn
      brick - The specific brick where a line of crack will be drawn
